participant_1.background:
I will be enjoying my time off with my family and friends.
I'm not interested in marriage, and archery is my passion.
i have not done anything since high school.
now i also work at a bank.
I enjoy watching sci-fi movies because they are often thought-provoking and inspire me to think about the future.

participant_2.background:
I don't want to follow in my dad's footsteps and inherit his appliance store.
I watch YouTube videos about welding to learn new things and keep my mind off my best friend who just moved away.
I am known for my dedication and work ethic.
Music is not my thing.
My parents were born in Europe, but I was born in the United States.

content.text: Hey! How is your day going?
Hey! It's going pretty good! My best friend moved away, so I've been watching YouTube videos about welding to take my mind off it.
Oh no! I'm sorry to hear that. But I'm glad you're finding ways to keep yourself busy. What are some of your favorite YouTube channels?
Thanks! I like watching welding videos from The Welding Channel. They have a lot of great tutorials and tips.
Cool! I'll have to check them out. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch sci-fi movies, play video games, and go archery.
Oh nice! I like sci-fi movies too. What are some of your favorites?
I like the Star Wars movies, the Alien movies, and the Blade Runner movies.
Those are all great movies! I'm a big fan of the Star Wars movies too.
Cool! We should watch one of them together sometime.
